data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Describe a perfect vacation. Where would you like to go? What would you like to do? Give a few examples."
data.answer: When it comes to a perfect vacation, I would like to go to an island to go fishing. For example, Fiji is a perfect destination. It has nice weather all year round as it's near the equator. It also has beautiful beaches and clear seawater. I would love to go fishing there because I have not experienced this yet and there is little opportunity to go fishing in the inland city where I live. Therefore, spending a holiday on an island such as Fiji is perfect for me.
